content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 17}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}]
thought: I need to craft blue_dye before I can make blue_stained_glass. Cornflower is required to make blue dye, so I'll move the cornflower from slot 23 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 17}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}]
thought: I have crafted the blue_dye, so I'll move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 17}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}]

thought: To craft blue stained glass, I need to place 1 blue dye surrounded by 8 glass blocks in the crafting grid. First, I will move one of the glass blocks to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
